alert.note: Alert for Bowie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 7:35AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Little River and central Bowie Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 735 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Boston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Wake Village, New Boston, Nash, Hooks, Red Lick, Leary, Red Bank and Pine Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Texas.
